meanings.definition: To make excessively warm or hot.
meanings.sent1: She kept overwarming the soup on the stove.
meanings.sent2: The sun overwarmed the room, making it uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The toaster seemed to be overwarming the bread on purpose.
meanings.sent4: His anger overwarmed the conversation, making it tense.
meanings.sent5: The heater overwarmed the small office, causing everyone to sweat.

meanings.definition: The act of becoming too warm or hot.
meanings.sent1: The overwarming of the house was due to the broken thermostat.
meanings.sent2: After the hike, she felt the overwarming of her body from the exertion.
meanings.sent3: The overwarming of the ice cream made it melt faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: The overwarming of the engine caused it to shut down unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The overwarming of the blanket made it unbearable to sleep under.
